onboarding.welcomeDesc: Let's personalize your experience. This will only take a minute.
onboarding.experienceDesc: This helps us tailor the interface and suggestions for you.
onboarding.expBeginnerDesc: Less than 1 year of trading experience.
onboarding.instrumentsDesc: Select all instruments you trade. You can change this later.
onboarding.platformDesc: This helps with trade import features.

tutorial.title: Welcome to TakeZ Plan!
tutorial.subtitle: Complete these steps to get started
tutorial.addFirstTradeDesc: Log a trade manually or import
tutorial.viewYourTradesDesc: Access your complete list of trades

aiInsights.title: AI-powered insights
aiInsights.subtitle: Your personal trading analyst powered by AI
aiInsights.heroDesc: Get personalized insights, pattern detection, and actionable recommendations based on your real performance data.
aiInsights.comingSoonDesc: We're building an AI agent that will analyze your trades, identify patterns, and suggest improvements. Stay tuned.

features.patternDetectionDesc: AI identifies recurring patterns in your winning and losing trades.
features.riskAnalysisDesc: Personalized recommendations to improve your risk management.
features.performanceInsightsDesc: Understand what works and what doesn't in your strategy.
features.actionableTipsDesc: Concrete suggestions to evolve as a trader.

aiInsights.ctaDesc: This feature is part of the Elite plan. Upgrade to get access when it launches.

aiHub.heroDesc: Use AI agents to analyze performance, detect patterns, and get personalized recommendations based on your data.
aiHub.patternDetectionDesc: Patterns by day, time, and pair
aiHub.reportSummaryDesc: Executive summary of the selected period
aiHub.takerzScoreExplanationDesc: Detailed explanation of your numbers based on the 6 Takerz Score metrics

economicEvents.title: Economic Calendar
economicEvents.subtitle: AI-powered economic events with impact scoring and personalized alerts
economicEvents.comingSoonDesc: This feature is under development. You'll be able to track important economic events, filter by impact, and receive personalized alerts.
economicEvents.noEvents: No events in the selected period
economicEvents.loadError: Error loading events. Check your connection and try again.
economicEvents.noAnalysis: Analysis not available for this event.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.noTrades: No trades match the current filter.
dashboard.addTradesDesc: To view your metrics and charts, you need to add your trades. Choose one of the options below to get started.
dashboard.filtersNoResults: The applied filters returned no results. Try adjusting the period or criteria.
dashboard.netPnlTooltip: Total net profit/loss realized across all closed trades.
dashboard.winRateTooltip: Percentage of winning trades out of total trades executed.
dashboard.avgWinLossTooltip: Average profit of all winning trades and average loss of all losing trades.
dashboard.profitFactorTooltip: Ratio of total gross profit to total gross loss. Values above 1 indicate profitability.
dashboard.dayWinRateTooltip: Percentage of your winning trading days out of total trading days.
dashboard.accountBalancePnlTooltip: Current account balance with the total P&L for all closed trades.
dashboard.aiInsightsSubtitle: Get intelligent analysis of your performance

dayView.title: Day View
dayView.selectMonthOrImport: Select another month in the calendar or import your trades.

trades.title: Trades
trades.comingSoonAll: Coming soon: detailed view of all your trades.
trades.comingSoonSingle: Coming soon: detailed view of the selected trade.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Account overview — full report like imports or MT5 history.
overview.noTradesFilter: No trades match the current filter.
overview.aiCardDesc: Generate an intelligent summary of the selected period

strategies.description: Performance analysis by strategy. Use tags to categorize your trades.
strategies.summaryTooltip: General metrics. Add strategy tags to trades for segmented analysis.

auth.loginSubtitle: Sign in with your email and password
auth.registerSubtitle: Fill in your details to get started

accountsPage.description: Link your MT4/MT5 accounts to automatically sync trades.
accountsPage.howItWorksDesc: When you link your account, we connect securely via MetaApi. You provide broker, server, and login. Credentials are encrypted and never stored in plain text. Sync fetches your trades periodically and updates the dashboard.
accountsPage.secureDisclaimer: Your credentials are encrypted and stored securely. We recommend using investor (read-only) password when available. We never store your password in plain text.
accountsPage.emptyDesc: Link your MT4 or MT5 account to automatically sync your trades and view real-time metrics.

import.title: Import Trades
import.description: Import your trades from CSV or MT5 files
import.dragDrop: Drag and drop or click to select
import.manualEntryDesc: Add one trade at a time (date, pair, entry/exit, pips, win/loss, tags).
import.uploadDesc: Export from MT4/MT5 as CSV, Excel or HTML. Accepts Positions/Deals reports with Time, Symbol, Price and Profit.
import.importTradesDesc: Upload MT4/MT5 report in CSV, Excel or HTML
import.linkAccountDesc: Connect your MT4/MT5 account for automatic sync

viewMode.privacyDesc: Hides balances and P&L; keeps performance metrics

widgets.netPnlDesc: The total realized net profit and loss for all closed trades.
widgets.accountBalancePnlDesc: Current account balance with the total P&L for all closed trades.
widgets.winRateDesc: Reflects the percentage of your winning trades out of total trades taken.
widgets.avgWinLossDesc: The average profit on all winning and losing trades.
widgets.profitFactorDesc: Total profits divided by total losses. A profit factor above 1.0 indicates a profitable trading system.
widgets.dayWinRateDesc: Reflects the percentage of your winning trading days out of total trading days.
widgets.tradeExpectancyDesc: The average amount you can expect to win, or lose, per trade based on your closed trades.
widgets.currentDayStreakDesc: Tracks how many winning days in a row you traded currently.
widgets.currentTradeStreakDesc: Tracks how many winning trades in a row you traded currently.
widgets.currentStreakDesc: Tracks how many winning days and trades in a row you traded currently.
widgets.maxDrawdownDesc: Shows the largest drop in cumulative P&L in $ view or account balance in % view.
widgets.avgDrawdownDesc: Shows the average drawdown during the selected period and the drawdown at the end of that period, or the current drawdown if no date filter is applied.
widgets.calendarHeatmapDesc: Full monthly heatmap with daily details and weekly sidebar
widgets.calendarMiniDesc: Compact monthly calendar with P&L per day
widgets.tradeTimeDesc: P&L scatter by hour of day
widgets.winAvgLineDesc: Weekly evolution of win rate and averages
widgets.dragToReorder: Drag to reorder. Click the eye icon to show/hide.

customize.title: Customize Dashboard
customize.allWidgetsAdded: All widgets are already visible on your dashboard.

recentTrades.title: Recent Trades
recentTrades.tooltip: List of most recent trades with symbol, date and result.

profile.bioDesc: A brief description about you (max 200 characters)
profile.timezoneDesc: To display dates and times in your local timezone
profile.manageInfo: Manage your personal information and platform preferences.

plans.freeDesc: Ideal to get started and understand your performance.
plans.proDesc: For traders who want to go further with advanced analytics.
plans.eliteDesc: For professional traders with AI and complete tools.
plans.upgradeCtaDesc: Access auto-sync, advanced reports, risk management and more.
plans.faqCancelAnswer: Yes! No contracts. You can cancel or downgrade whenever you want. When you cancel, your plan stays active until the end of the paid period.
plans.faqDowngrade: What happens to my data if I downgrade?
plans.faqDowngradeAnswer: Your data is kept. However, features from the higher plan will be disabled. If you return to a paid plan, everything will be available again.
plans.faqPayment: What payment methods do you accept?
plans.faqPaymentAnswer: Credit/debit card (Visa, MasterCard, Amex), PIX and bank slip. Payments processed securely via Stripe.
plans.faqAnnual: Is there a discount for annual plans?
plans.faqAnnualAnswer: Yes! With the annual plan you save 2 months. Pro annual is $149/year and Elite is $249/year.
plans.upgradeSuccess: Upgrade successful! Your plan has been updated.
plans.checkoutCanceled: Checkout canceled. No charge was made.

upgradeModal.heading: Unlock the Pro plan
upgradeModal.description: Access AI agents, advanced reports, auto-sync, and more.

creditsModal.heading: Buy extra credits
creditsModal.description: Keep using AI agents without interruption.
creditsModal.feature2: Credits don't expire in the period

credits.title: AI Credits
credits.upgradeRequired: AI credits are available on Pro and Elite plans.
credits.upgradeRequiredDesc: Upgrade your plan to use AI agents and buy extra credits.

strategiesComingSoon.heading: Manage your trading strategies
strategiesComingSoon.description: Create, organize, and track each strategy's performance. Compare win rates, P&L, and evolution over time — all in one place.
strategiesComingSoon.feature2: Link trades to strategies with tags
strategiesComingSoon.footer: We're working on it. In the meantime, use tags on your trades and view reports by strategy.

reportsGate.heading: Advanced reports on the Pro plan
reportsGate.description: Unlock deep insights into your performance with professional analytics.
reportsGate.feature3: Analysis by day/time, symbols and strategies

planErrors.linkAccountFree: Direct MT4/MT5 account linking is available on the Pro plan. Upgrade to sync your accounts automatically.
planErrors.maxAccountsPro: You've reached the limit of 5 active accounts. Remove or archive an account to add another.
planErrors.maxManualFree: The Free plan allows only 1 manual account. Upgrade to Pro to add more accounts.
planErrors.creditsZero: Your analysis credits have run out. Buy more credits to continue using AI agents.
planErrors.aiFree: AI agents are available on the Pro plan. Upgrade to unlock.
planErrors.importLimit: You've reached this month's import limit. Upgrade to Pro for unlimited imports.
planErrors.reportsFree: Advanced reports are available on the Pro plan. Upgrade to unlock.
planErrors.exportPdfFree: PDF export is available on the Pro plan. Upgrade to unlock.
